PrepareRite:ReiMu.NAME: 準備式

RunawayExorcism:ReiMu.DESCRIPTION: From within the top !M! cards of your draw pile, play all Attack cards and discard all non-Attack cards.

ManaGlint:ReiMu.NAME: Exorcising Border
ManaGlint:ReiMu.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust a card. NL Gain Flame Faith equal to it's cost. NL Deal damage equal to Flame Faith to ALL enemies.
ManaGlint:ReiMu.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Exhaust a card. NL Gain Flame Faith equal to double it's cost. Deal damage equal to Flame Faith to ALL enemies.

LovePray:ReiMu.NAME: Love Prayer
LovePray:ReiMu.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Sun Faith. NL Add a Romance O-mikuji into your hand.
LovePray:ReiMu.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Sun Faith. NL Add a Romance O-mikuji into your hand. NL (It won't be Worst Luck)

YinYang:ReiMu.NAME: Yin-Yang Asuka'i
YinYang:ReiMu.DESCRIPTION: Gain 2 Flight. NL Deal damage equal to !M! times your Flight.

DependentForm:ReiMu.NAME: Spirit Medium Form
DependentForm:ReiMu.DESCRIPTION: At the end of your turn, gain !M! random Faith.
DependentForm:ReiMu.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: At the end of your turn, gain !M! random Faith.

Enchanting:ReiMu.NAME: Evil-Sealing Circle
Enchanting:ReiMu.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! 脱力. NL Apply !M! 弱体.

Oblation:ReiMu.NAME: 鬼神磷火术
Oblation:ReiMu.DESCRIPTION: 献祭  !M! :造成 !D! 点伤害。如果杀死敌人，获得5层 请神 。 消耗  。

SealNeedle:ReiMu.NAME: Sealing Needle
SealNeedle:ReiMu.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. If it deals unblocked damage, the enemy loses !M! Strength. NL Repeat !M! times. Exhaust.

AirSuppress:ReiMu.NAME: Air Suppress
AirSuppress:ReiMu.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies twice. Gain !M! Wind Faith. NL Flight: Apply 2 弱体 to ALL enemies.
AirSuppress:ReiMu.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !M! damage to ALL enemies twice. Gain !M! Wind Faith. NL Flight: Apply 3 弱体 to ALL enemies.
